itunes:title: Doctrine & Covenants 49-50 : Dr. Lili De Hoyos Anderson Part I
title: Doctrine & Covenants 49-50 : Dr. Lili De Hoyos Anderson Part I
description:
What happens when new members come from different faith backgrounds? Dr. Lili de Hoyos Anderson joins us to discuss how the Lord, through Joseph Smith revealed the truth about eternal marriage, the Second Coming, and other doctrines as the Saints question their previous belief systems. You’ll love Dr. Anderson’s practical marriage advice, learning about Parley P. Pratt’s fiery personality, and gain a little more understanding about the Shakers and their influence on missionary work.

Show notes: https://followhim.co/episodes
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/FollowHimOfficialChannel
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/followhimpodcast
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/followhimpodcast
